concise_definition: n. 块, 团; v. 把… lump 成块, 一并处理

definitions.explanation_en: A small, irregular mass or chunk of a solid substance, often without a defined shape.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指一种小而形状不规则的固体块状物，通常没有明确的外形。
definitions.example_en: She stirred the soup until the flour dissolved and no lumps remained.
definitions.example_cn: 她搅拌汤，直到面粉完全溶解，没有留下任何块状物。

definitions.explanation_en: A small, rounded swelling or protuberance on the body, often caused by injury or disease.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指身体上因受伤或疾病引起的小型圆形隆起或肿块。
definitions.example_en: He felt a lump on his neck and went to see a doctor immediately.
definitions.example_cn: 他感到脖子上有个肿块，立即去看医生。

definitions.explanation_en: A group of things or people considered together without distinction, often in a careless or dismissive way.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指将事物或人不加区分地归为一组，常带有粗心或轻视的意味。
definitions.example_en: He lumped all the critics together as jealous people.
definitions.example_cn: 他把所有批评者一概视为嫉妒的人。

definitions.explanation_en: To form or press something into a lump or lumps; to make into a compact mass.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指将某物形成或压成块状，使其成为紧密的团块。
definitions.example_en: The sugar had lumped together in the container after being exposed to moisture.
definitions.example_cn: 糖因受潮而在容器中结成了块。

definitions.explanation_en: To group or classify things or people together in an undifferentiated way, often unfairly or simplistically.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指以不加区分的方式将事物或人归为一类，常带有不公平或简单化的倾向。
definitions.example_en: Don't lump all teenagers together as rebellious — many are responsible and thoughtful.
definitions.example_cn: 不要把所有青少年都一概视为叛逆的——很多人是负责任且有思想的。

comparison.analysis: “Clump” (丛, 团) 通常指自然聚集在一起的物体，如草丛、头发打结，强调的是聚集状态而非形状不规则；而 “lump” 更强调不规则、无结构的固体块状物，常含负面或不雅的意味。
“Mass” (质量, 大量) 是一个更中性、更广泛的术语，可指任何大量聚集的物质或人群，常用于科学或抽象语境；而 “lump” 更具体，常指不规则、笨重、不精致的实体，带有口语化或贬义色彩。
“Bundle” (捆, 包) 指有意识地将物品捆绑或打包在一起，通常有组织性、目的性；而 “lump” 暗示无序、随意地归为一类，缺乏结构或意图，常含贬义。
